locations.name: The Bedroom
locations.description:
As you stand in your bedroom, your heart pounding in your chest, 
you quickly take stock of your surroundings, there is a sound outside your bedroom door. You need to act fast. 
The first priority is to find a way out of your house and assess the situation outside.
you have two options: The living room (south) or the bathroom (east)

prompts.prompt: search your bag for a weapon
prompts.response: You search your backpack for something that can be used as a weapon and find a

items.name: first aid kit
items.description: A well-stocked first aid kit containing bandages, antiseptic, and painkillers

items.name: baseball bat
items.description: A wooden baseball bat, worn and splintered but still sturdy

locations.name: The Bathroom
locations.description:
You step into the bathroom, feeling the cramped space surround you. 
The flickering light barely illuminates the worn tiles on the floor. 
The air carries a musty odor, a reminder of the neglect this room has endured. 
You have two options: (south) to the hallway, 
or (east) a small window onto the roof

items.name: razor
items.description: A worn razor with a sharp blade rests on the counter, ready for a close shave

items.name: floss
items.description: A roll of dental floss sits nearby, a tool to keep your teeth clean and healthy in the midst of chaos

locations.name: The Roof
locations.description:
As you cautiously climb onto the roof through a small opening in the bathroom ceiling, 
you find yourself standing on a weathered surface, cracked and worn by the elements. 
The once bright red tiles have faded over time, giving the rooftop an eerie ambiance. 
The only exit from the roof is to the (west), leading back into the bathroom, its too far to jump down

prompts.response:
You scan the area from the rooftop, taking in the bleak landscape that stretches before you. In the distance, 
you spot the skeletal remains of a once-bustling town. Among the crumbling buildings, your eyes fixate on the glimmering facade of a shopping mall. 
It stands as a beacon of potential resources and shelter amidst the chaos. Your gaze then shifts to the outskirts of town, 
where a tunnel entrance emerges, seemingly untouched by the undead. It offers a possible escape route to safety. 
Armed with this knowledge, you steel yourself for the challenges ahead, ready to navigate the dangers and make your way towards the mall and the tunnel.

items.name: rusty crowbar
items.description:
a rusty crowbar lying near the edge of the roof. Its worn handle suggests it has seen its fair share of use, 
possibly for breaking into or out of places.

items.name: Telescope
items.description:
The second object is an old, weathered telescope, fixed on top of a tripod. 
It seems to have been used for stargazing in the days before chaos descended upon the world.

locations.name: The Living room
locations.description:
You take a deep breath, steeling your nerves, and decide to quietly approach the room 
from where the growling sound originated. Slowly and cautiously, you make your way into the living room, 
trying to minimize any noise that might alert the creature near by.

As you reach the room, you peak your head around the corner 
looking for any movement or signs of danger. 
The growling becomes more distinct, accompanied by occasional shuffling sounds. 
It's clear that there is a zombie lurking in here

with a steady hand, you reach for your backpack, it's important to be prepared for what might happen 

 Your exits are (east) hallway or (south) Garage

prompts.prompt: You attack the zombie with your weapon
prompts.response:
You search your backpack for something that can be used as a weapon. With determination, 
you swing your weapon at the zombie, landing a solid blow and sending it to the floor. 
The impact sends a jolt of adrenaline through your veins, 
reminding you of your resilience in the face of danger.

items.name: metal pipe
items.description: A sturdy metal pipe, slightly rusted but still useful as a makeshift weapon.

items.name: family photo
items.description: A faded photograph depicting happier times, serving as a bittersweet reminder of what once was.

locations.name: The Hallway
locations.description:
You decide to head towards the hallway to investigate further. 
With cautious steps, you leave your bedroom and enter the dimly lit hallway. 
The air feels heavy, and the silence is eerie. As you glance around, 
you notice several closed doors, each leading to different parts of your house.
Suddenly, you hear a low, guttural growl coming from one of the nearby rooms. 
The sound sends shivers down your spine, confirming your worst fears: 
The zombies have infiltrated your house. It's crucial to remain calm and think on your feet. 

 your exits are (south) street (west) living room

prompts.response: As you survey the dimly lit hallway, shadows dance along the peeling wallpaper, creating an eerie atmosphere. Flickering lights cast intermittent illumination, revealing worn carpeting underfoot. The sounds of shuffling feet grow louder, signifying the presence of approaching zombies. Amidst the gloom, you notice a glint on the floor and spot a set of keys. They may prove useful in unlocking doors or vehicles, potentially providing an escape route or access to valuable resources. Exercise caution as you navigate this treacherous corridor, knowing that danger lurks around every corner.

items.name: keys
items.description: A set of keys, jingling softly as you pick them up. They may unlock doors or vehicles, opening up new possibilities for exploration or escape.

items.name: potted plant
items.description:
A small potted plant sits in the corner, its leaves drooping from lack of care. 
The soil is dry and cracked, reflecting the neglect that has befallen this once-thriving greenery.

locations.name: The Garage
locations.description:
A dimly lit, musty space filled with abandoned tools and discarded vehicle parts. 
The remnants of failed attempts to escape lie scattered amidst oil stains and broken windows. 
As you cautiously step into the garage, you notice movement in the shadows. 
A group of zombies has found their way inside, their decaying forms shuffling towards you with insatiable hunger. 
You must think quickly and find a way to defend yourself or escape before they overwhelm you. 

 your exits are (south) street (north) living room

items.name: wrench
items.description: A sturdy wrench, its metal surface worn from years of use. This versatile tool can be handy for various repairs or even as a makeshift weapon against zombies.

items.name: gasoline can
items.description: An old, rusty gasoline can half-filled with fuel. While it may be heavy and leaky, it holds valuable resources that could potentially power a generator or provide the means to start a fire.

locations.name: The Street
locations.description:
A desolate, eerie stretch of cracked asphalt. Abandoned cars line the sides, their windows shattered and doors left open. Silence reigns, broken only by the faint rustle of wind through discarded debris

your exits are (south) the highway (North) the hallway in the home

prompts.response: As you approach the abandoned cars, you carefully inspect them one by one. Most of them have been picked clean by scavengers or left in disarray. However, you stumble upon a partially open trunk, revealing a duffel bag filled with supplies. It's a lucky find amidst the bleakness of the street, offering you a glimmer of hope.

As you stand on the desolate street, a distant sound catches your attention. 
It's a faint cry for help, carried by the wind. You strain your ears to locate the source, 
wondering if it's another survivor in need or a trap set by the zombies. 
Your decision to investigate may lead to a critical encounter, so choose your path cautiously.

items.name: baseball cap
items.description: A baseball cap, faded and worn, but capable of shielding your eyes from the glaring sun or hiding your face from prying eyes.

items.name: duffel bag
items.description: A worn duffel bag, slightly torn but still functional.

locations.name: The Highway
locations.description:
A desolate stretch of asphalt, overgrown with weeds and abandoned vehicles. The distant moans of the undead mix with the sound of wind whistling through empty shells of cars 

 Your exits are (west) street (east) mall

prompts.response: As you stand on the highway, you strain your ears to catch any sounds amidst the desolation. The distant moans of the undead echo through the air, a constant reminder of the danger that lurks nearby. It's crucial to stay alert and keep your guard up.

As you survey the abandoned vehicles and overgrown weeds on the highway, a sense of desolation and isolation washes over you. The once-bustling road now lies empty, a haunting reminder of the world that once was. Broken glass glitters in the sunlight, and a few scattered items catch your attention. Be cautious as you navigate this forlorn path, as danger may still be lurking in the shadows.

items.name: a tire iron
items.description: A sturdy tire iron, its metal surface slightly rusted. While primarily used for changing tires, it can also serve as a makeshift weapon in dire situations.

items.name: empty gas can
items.description: An empty gas can, its sides dented and worn. Though currently devoid of fuel, it may come in handy if you stumble upon a source of gasoline along your journey.

locations.name: The Mall
locations.description: Congratulations! You have reached the mall, a fortified safe haven amidst the chaos. Inside its walls, survivors have come together, creating a community of hope and resilience. The once bustling hub of commerce now serves as a sanctuary, offering protection and resources to those who have endured the zombie apocalypse. You have successfully completed the game, and your survival journey has come to an end. Take a moment to rest, replenish your supplies, and celebrate your triumph over the undead

prompts.response: As you step into the desolate mall, the absence of human activity is palpable. Silence reigns, broken only by the occasional creaking of broken structures and the distant scuffling of creatures. Be vigilant and trust your instincts as you navigate this maze of remnants from a bygone era.

As you survey the decimated mall, memories of bustling shoppers and vibrant storefronts flood your mind. Now, the hallways are strewn with debris, and shattered glass crunches under your feet. Amongst the wreckage, you spot a few items that may prove useful. Stay focused, for reaching the mall signifies the culmination of your survival journey.
